About Me

Nikki

Hi, I'm Nikki, the girl behind this website and the Monkeyology podcast. Thanks for tuning in! Email me or send a DM on Instagram if you have any questions.

About Monkeyology

Monkeyology is a project I created to talk about environmental science (and to do it in a girly way, of course). This is in an effort to show that femininity and analytical ability are not exclusive of each other, and embracing who you are in a world that frowns upon it results in amazing things. You can check out the accompanying podcast on Apple Podcasts or read the Monkeyology blog here!
